thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Roberta
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Roberta

author: Roberta
title: Roberta
text: Very helpful throughout the process. Kept me informed of the process and kept in contact with us. Always returned phone calls and there was never a questioned asked viewed as a stupid question. Received all the information in advance to make a decision. The appraisers and notaries that worked with us were on time and we were never rushed through the process.
